name: Lasonas & Thalia
description:
Lasonas, a man who lost his loved Thalia, is determined to bring ber back to the humans' world. To rescue her, Lasonas must build a tower in order to reach heaven.

Before starting to gather the necessary elements, Lasonas will obtain a cape-shaped artifact which grants him the ability to alternate between two parallel realities.

Inputs:

Horizontal Movement: A or D

Push/Pull objects: Z or K

Alternate between realities (with cape): X or L

Pause game: P or Esc
